name: Unstable Ruins
description:
Unstable Ruins

You are a penguin looking for treasures inside some ancient ruins. Everything is collapsing so make sure you get all the treasures as fast as you can!

DON'T DO THIS!!!

Do this instead!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Every time you hit the ground all the unstable rocks will start to collapse!
  • Get the trophy to win the level.
  • Get the ring for extra difficulty!
  • Get to the trophy on time before the ruin collapses and get the time medal!

CONTROLS

Controller

  • A - Jump
  • Stick/D-Pad - Move Around
  • LT - Reset Level

Keyboard

  • Z - Jump
  • Arrows - Move Around
  • R - Reset Level

This was made in about 72h for Ludum Dare 49!
